function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Biophilic design could potentially contribute to the spread of contagious diseases through the creation of habitats for animals in urban areas.","Impact":"Increased risk of zoonotic diseases spreading to human populations, leading to potential outbreaks and public health crises.","Mitigation":"Thorough monitoring and management of urban wildlife habitats, implementation of preventive measures to reduce zoonotic disease transmission.","Technologies":"Urban wildlife tracking and monitoring systems, wildlife habitat management technologies.","People":"Urban populations, public health authorities, wildlife conservation organizations.","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planning departments, wildlife conservation organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of appropriate water management in biophilic design could lead to the proliferation of disease-carrying vectors such as mosquitoes.","Impact":"Increased risk of vector-borne diseases transmission, posing a threat to public health and well-being.","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective water management strategies, adoption of mosquito control measures, and community-based vector control programs.","Technologies":"Smart water management systems, mosquito surveillance and control technologies.","People":"Local communities, public health agencies, environmental protection organizations.","Owner":"Local government authorities, public health agencies, environmental protection organizations."}]}
